me.kiip.api
Class Resource

java.lang.Object
  me.kiip.api.Resource

public final class Resource
extends Object

Class which stores Kiip resource attributes. Developers may use this class to either modify the content of Kiip resources that are displayed in their game, create custom Kiip notifications for their game or both. 

 RequestListener<Resource> listener = new RequestListener<Resource>() {
     @Override
     public void onResource(String id, Resource resource) {
         ...
         Kiip.getInstance().showResource(resource);
         ...
     }
 }

 ...

 Kiip.getInstance().unlockAchievement("_achievement_id_", listener);
 Kiip.getInstance().saveLeaderboard("_leaderboard_id_", _score_, listener);

Author:
Grantland Chew
See Also:
Kiip.showResource(me.kiip.api.Resource)
